snippet.title: Rhythm Retro! A brand new style of tap rhythm game.
snippet.description:
14 themes, 20 songs, 6 gameplay modes, 7 Achievements, 6 class upgrades and a heck of a lot of fun!

Rhythm Retro has an Online Top 60 leaderboard and is the first Rhythm Game ever to have  RPG element.  It was developed and tested to perfection on every gameplay mode, and even has a calibrate lag section for when you use blue-tooth headphones and the audio lags!  Nothing wasn't thought of for this game.  The in-game store works as a catalyst for all the unlockable items and you generate Retro Bucks by watching Ads. Or winning Gold Medals.  When you purchase the full version however, you earn Retro Bucks for every time you play a song and more if you do better.

Each level is unique, and each Note and Button theme is unique, but you can also mix and match notes and buttons to whatever you want!

Download Rhythm Retro Today!

https://www.soulzilla.ca    has both version links in the Google Play Store!
